about_the_game:
Embark on an Adventure Where Creatures and Choices Define Your Legacy!

Tchin invites you into a vibrant, sprawling 3D open world teeming with mysterious creatures—also called Tchin—that are yours to discover, tame, and bond with. While inspired by the spirit of monster-taming classics, this is a universe all its own, where exploration, strategy, and player freedom collide.

Tame Unique Companions
Venture across untamed wilds, dense forests, and forgotten ruins to befriend a diverse array of Tchin. Each boasts distinct abilities, evolving traits, and secrets to unlock. Will you train a fiery guardian, a cunning trickster, or a spectral enigma? The choice is yours.

Master Two Styles of Combat
Outthink rivals in strategic turn-based battles that reward careful planning, or dive into real-time clashes where split-second decisions turn the tide. Switch styles on the fly to keep rivals guessing—and prove your mastery of both.

Shape a World Alive with Possibility
Every character you meet has a story—and how you interact with them writes your own. Forge alliances, challenge strangers to duels, or stir up harmless chaos. Steal treasures, lend a hand, or become the troublemaker no one saw coming. Your actions ripple across the world, opening new paths, rivals, and rewards.

Key Features:

  • Open-World Exploration: Traverse dynamic ecosystems filled with secrets, hidden Tchin, and ever-changing challenges.

  • Dual Combat Systems: Master turn-based tactics and real-time action in a fresh twist on creature battles.

  • Meaningful Choices: Be hero, villain, or wildcard—your decisions shape relationships, quests, and the world itself.

  • Endless Team Variety: Build a roster of Tchin that reflects your strategy, style, and personality.

The Tchin Await—Will You Lead or Disrupt?
Gather your team. Forge your legacy.

Tchin—Where every creature, battle, and choice is yours to command.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Celeron G530 2.4Ghz or similar
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650M or similar
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements for playing at 720p@30fps

short_description: Play a 3D Monster Taming Open World game ! Tame Tchins and use them for battle. Every Tchin is unique, they can have different colors,bones and brain. Raise your own custom army of tchins and conquer the world!
